title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Purpose: Sets the legal framework governing the use of the iTunes Store and related services.

title: PAYMENTS, TAXES, AND REFUND POLICY
Purpose: Outlines payment responsibilities, taxes, and conditions for order cancellations and refunds.

title: 1-Click
Purpose: Explains the 1-Click purchasing feature for quick transactions on the Stores.

title: GIFT CERTIFICATES, ITUNES CARDS AND CODES, ALLOWANCES, AND CONTENT CODES
Purpose: Details the terms regarding the use of gift certificates, iTunes cards, and codes, including redeemability and limitations.

title: GIFTS
Purpose: States the conditions for purchasing and redeeming gifts from the Stores.

title: IMPORTANT SAFETY INFORMATION
Purpose: Provides guidelines for safe use of products to prevent strain and health issues.

title: PRE-ORDERS
Purpose: Describes the process and conditions surrounding pre-ordering items from the Stores.

title: FAMILY SHARING
Purpose: Details the Family Sharing feature that allows multiple users within a household to access shared content.

title: ELECTRONIC CONTRACTING
Purpose: Clarifies that your use of the Stores involves electronic agreements and bindings.

title: ITUNES STORE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Purpose: Governs the use of the iTunes Store service for purchasing digital content.

title: REQUIREMENTS FOR USE OF THE SERVICE
Purpose: Lists the conditions necessary to access and use the iTunes Store service.

title: YOUR ACCOUNT
Purpose: Outlines user responsibilities regarding account security and activity.

title: AUTOMATIC DELIVERY AND DOWNLOADING PREVIOUS PURCHASES
Purpose: Explains the auto-download feature and conditions for accessing previously acquired content.

title: ITUNES MATCH
Purpose: Describes the features and requirements of the iTunes Match subscription service.

title: PRIVACY
Purpose: Refers to Apple’s Privacy Policy governing data usage and user privacy.

title: CONTENT AVAILABILITY
Purpose: Reserves the right to change content availability and features without notice.

title: USE OF CONTENT
Purpose: Clarifies that iTunes Products are licensed only for personal use under specific rules.

title: USAGE RULES
Purpose: Outlines the specific usage conditions for iTunes Products, including restrictions.

title: CONTENT SECURITY
Purpose: Prohibits tampering with the security measures that protect digital content.

title: SERVICE SECURITY
Purpose: Establishes rules regarding authorized access to the Service and consequences of violations.

title: SEASON PASS, MULTI-PASS
Purpose: Details terms related to the purchase and use of Season Passes and Multi-Passes.

title: HIGH-DEFINITION (HD) PRODUCTS
Purpose: Specifies device compatibility for viewing HD Products.

title: SUBMISSIONS TO THE SERVICE
Purpose: Addresses the responsibilities and licensing of materials submitted via the Service.

title: THIRD-PARTY MATERIALS
Purpose: Clarifies iTunes' lack of responsibility for third-party materials linked within the Service.

title: OBJECTIONABLE MATERIAL
Purpose: Acknowledges potential exposure to offensive content while using the Service.

title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
Purpose: Affirms iTunes’ ownership of the Service and its content and prohibits unauthorized use.

title: TERMINATION
Purpose: Describes conditions under which iTunes may terminate accounts and agreements.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
Purpose: Limits iTunes’ liability concerning the Service and outlines warranty disclaimers.

title: CHANGES
Purpose: Reserves the right to modify the agreement and impose additional terms.

title: MISCELLANEOUS
Purpose: Contains various legal provisions that govern the relationship between the user and iTunes.

title: Notification
Purpose: This section outlines how iTunes may communicate with users regarding the Service.

title: Compliance and Disclosure
Purpose: This section establishes iTunes' rights to disclose information for legal compliance and enforcement purposes.

title: Account and Registration
Purpose: This section describes the responsibility of users in managing their accounts and maintaining accurate registration data.

title: Requirements for Use of the Stores
Purpose: This section outlines the eligibility requirements and technical specifications for using the Stores.

title: Automatic Delivery
Purpose: This section explains how purchases may be automatically delivered to associated devices.

title: Privacy
Purpose: This section states that the Stores are subject to Apple's Privacy Policy.

title: Use of Products and the Stores
Purpose: This section describes the licensing of Products and the compliance with usage rules.

title: Content Security
Purpose: This section prohibits unauthorized tampering with the security of the Products.

title: Store Security
Purpose: This section mandates that users access the Stores only through authorized Apple software.

title: Submissions to the Stores
Purpose: This section outlines the rules for user submissions and disclaimers of liability for such content.

title: Third-Party Materials
Purpose: This section disclaims responsibility for third-party content linked from the Stores.

title: Objectionable Material
Purpose: This section acknowledges the potential for encountering offensive content while using the Stores.

title: Intellectual Property
Purpose: This section affirms the ownership rights of iTunes and its products.

title: Termination
Purpose: This section describes the conditions under which iTunes may terminate the Agreement or account.

title: Disclaimer of Warranties; Liability Limitations
Purpose: This section limits iTunes' liability and disclaims certain warranties regarding the Services.

title: Changes
Purpose: This section allows iTunes to modify the Agreement with immediate effect upon notification.

title: Miscellaneous
Purpose: This section includes various provisions about the Agreement's entire scope, enforceability, and governing law.

title: License of Products
Purpose: This section details the licensing structure for both Apple and third-party products from the Stores.

title: In-App Purchases
Purpose: This section describes how in-app purchases function and the associated limitations.

title: In-App Subscriptions
Purpose: This section explains the terms surrounding subscriptions purchased within the app.

title: MAC App Store Product Usage Rules
Purpose: This section outlines the specific usage rules for products downloaded from the Mac App Store.

title: APP STORE PRODUCT USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section provides the terms for individual and commercial usage of products from the App Store.

title: MAC APP STORE AND APP STORE PRODUCT MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT
Purpose: This section clarifies the responsibility for maintenance and support of products.

title: Licensed Application End User License Agreement
Purpose: This section sets forth the licensing agreement for using applications from the App Store and Mac App Store.

title: Commercial Computer Software
Purpose: To outline the licensing terms for U.S. Government end users regarding commercial software and documentation.

title: Governing Law
Purpose: To state that the license is governed by English laws and that use of the licensed application may be subject to various laws.

title: iBooks Store Terms and Conditions
Purpose: To describe the licensing agreement between users and publishers for iBooks Store products sold through iTunes.

title: iBooks Store Product Usage Rules
Purpose: To define the limitations and authorizations for using iBooks Store products for personal and non-commercial purposes.
